attributes.action: LProvide legislation to ensure that the elderly abused in nursing homes have equal rights to those protecting abused children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The elderly are still being abused in private and public nursing homes. Our children are, quite rightly, protected against abuse. Why then are not the elderly who often are equally unable to protect themselves against abuse, physical or mental?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
